articles.title: Putin and Modi expand India-Russia economic ties in talks in New Delhi - NPR
articles.description: India gave Russia's leader a warm welcome in his first visit since his country invaded Ukraine. The visit in part signaled India's defiance of the U.S., which has punished New Delhi for buying Russian oil.
articles.content: MUMBAI, India There was a hug and selfie in a limousine ride after Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi personally picked up Russian President Vladimir Putin on arrival in the capital New Delhi on Thu… [+5811 chars]
